title: listQualify
name: listQualify
description: Inserts a string at the beginning and end of list elements.

arguments.name: qualifier
arguments.description: string to insert before and after the list elements specified in the elements parameter.

arguments.name: delimiters
arguments.description: Characters that separate list elements. The default value is comma.

arguments.name: elements
arguments.description:
which type of element are qualified
			 - all (default): all elements
			 - char: elements that are composed of alphabetic characters

arguments.name: includeEmptyFields
arguments.description: if set to true, empty values are included as well
